item.title: Yoto Mini Teardown and Rescue
item.description: Yesterday my daughter’s Yoto mini took a dunk in the bathtub. She was devastated, she uses it almost constantly. So it was Dad to the rescue.Â  The device was straight forward to take apart, but I wanted to share how I did it so that other parents don’t have to figure it out on the fly.
